alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 12:34AM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total new snow accumulations of one to three feet in the Sierra and 8 to 16 inches in the Whites. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....Two periods of heavy snow are expected - one Saturday afternoon and evening, and one Sunday night through Monday night.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
